ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Functionality to download stock prices, cryptocurrency data, and more from the 'Tiingo' API <https://api.tiingo.com/>.
Functionality to download stock prices, cryptocurrency data, and more from the 'Tiingo' API <https://api.tiingo.com/>.

name: r-riingo
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.3.1" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-riingo
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/riingo_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/riingo/riingo_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 720b2067f49eebdcb28b257d75e8d68277531c5c9921b3784beaf9b081be89f3

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 4

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-crayon >=1.3.4
    - r-dplyr >=0.7.4
    - r-glue >=1.3.1
    - r-httr >=1.3.1
    - r-jsonlite >=1.5
    - r-purrr >=0.2.4
    - r-rlang >=0.2.0
    - r-tibble >=1.4.2

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-crayon >=1.3.4
    - r-dplyr >=0.7.4
    - r-glue >=1.3.1
    - r-httr >=1.3.1
    - r-jsonlite >=1.5
    - r-purrr >=0.2.4
    - r-rlang >=0.2.0
    - r-tibble >=1.4.2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('riingo')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('riingo')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/business-science/riingo
  license: MIT
  summary: Functionality to download stock prices, cryptocurrency data, and more from the 'Tiingo' API <https://api.tiingo.com/>.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - oblute
    - benhuff
    - agcopenhaver

# The original CRAN metadata for this package was:

# Package: riingo
# Type: Package
# Title: An R Interface to the 'Tiingo' Stock Price API
# Version: 0.2.0
# Authors@R: c( person("Davis", "Vaughan", email = "davis@rstudio.com", role = c("aut", "cre")), person("Matt", "Dancho", email = "mdancho@business-science.io", role = c("aut")) )
# Maintainer: Davis Vaughan <davis@rstudio.com>
# Description: Functionality to download stock prices, cryptocurrency data, and more from the 'Tiingo' API <https://api.tiingo.com/>.
# URL: https://github.com/business-science/riingo
# BugReports: https://github.com/business-science/riingo/issues
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# Encoding: UTF-8
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# LazyData: true
# Depends: R (>= 2.10)
# Imports: crayon (>= 1.3.4), dplyr (>= 0.7.4), glue (>= 1.3.1), httr (>= 1.3.1), jsonlite (>= 1.5), tibble (>= 1.4.2), rlang (>= 0.2.0), purrr (>= 0.2.4)
# Suggests: testthat, covr
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-05-10 15:37:25 UTC; davis
# Author: Davis Vaughan [aut, cre], Matt Dancho [aut]
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-05-11 06:40:03 UTC

# See
# https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda-build for
# more information about meta.yaml
